MonsterTrait.Name: Frost Walker
MonsterTrait.Text: The fraughashar's speed is unimpeded by rocky, snowy, or icy terrain. It never needs to make Dexterity checks to move or avoid falling prone because of icy or snowy ground.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The fraughashar makes one bite attack and one dagger attack.

MonsterAction.Name: Bite
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Dagger
MonsterAction.Text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Sling
MonsterAction.Text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.
